params.sourceEid: The endpoint id of source chain.

params._oApp: The address of the OApp that is sending the composed message.

lzCompose(address,bytes32,bytes,address,.details: Decodes the message payload to perform a token swap.      This method expects the encoded compose message to contain the swap amount and recipient address.

params: /*Executor Data*/ Additional data for checking for a specific executor (unused in this mock).
params._message: The encoded message content in the format of the OFTComposeMsgCodec.
params._oApp: The address of the originating OApp.

lzCompose(address,bytes32,bytes,address,.notice: Handles incoming composed messages from LayerZero.
